name: Saravati
greetingText: I must say, your name suits my heart perfectly!
wishText: May your days be painted with the colors of joy and love.
text1: Today is a day as special as you are - it's your birthday!!! ðŸŽ‰
textInChatBox: Sending you a world of happiness on your special day, and wishing for even more wonderful moments ahead!
text2: I had a different plan initially.
text4: I realized I wanted to make this moment
text5Content: You're the center of my universe
outroText: Now, take a moment to tell me how you felt. Did I manage to bring a smile to your face?
replayText: Feel free to watch it again if you wish.
